ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Resist question
ygData.msgSnippet: Speaking of resists...I spent another full 12 hours camping the Lord in Lower Guk Sunday in the hopes that I might obtain my first Ykesha...still not luck,
ygData.messageBody:
Speaking of resists...I spent another full 12 hours camping the Lord in
Lower Guk Sunday in the hopes that I might obtain my first Ykesha...still
not luck, but...

With a level 46 Cleric's MR buff and me twisting Elemental (sans drum, I'm a
classic battle bard wanna-be) and Guardian I boosted our party MR so high
that when we fought a Jin Wizzy in the Lord room we all resisted nearly
every spell. I resisted several force shocks and even gravity flux entirely
(My MR was 156). The folks in the group kept shouting "wow resist!" during
the fight, now that's fun stuff.

-Faras
43 (barely) bard of E'ci

> -----Original Message-----
> From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
> Sent: Monday, March 20, 2000 11:28 AM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Resist question
>
>
> From: <kim@...>
>
> On Mon, 20 Mar 2000, Ryan Honeyman wrote:
> >
> > And you probably never will outright resist an NPC lifetap.
> > If your Magic Resist is close to 100, he will never Grav Flux
> > however. (Not that it hurts that bad for us, with Safe Fall)
>
> Never say never. He got a gravity flux on me last night with
> 167 MR. I resisted all the other ones though.
>
> I've yet to resist Innoruk's gravity flux, but for some reason
> high MR seems to decrease the damage you take from it. The
> first time I fought him, I got tossed 3-4 times before my hp
> bar ever showed any white.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
